Usage
=====

This section shows how to use the simulator after installation.

Running the CLI
---------------

.. code-block:: bash

   python main.py

You will be guided through selecting controls and running audit simulations.

Control Categories
------------------

- Access Control
- Logging & Monitoring
- Backup & Recovery
- Change Management
- Data Protection

Reports
-------

Each control test returns:

- Pass/Fail
- Evidence summary
- Recommended remediation
